description.value:
The Patron you choose lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

The Fathomless
Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMessage000]{Message}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThornWhip0]{Thorn Whip} (without material component, appears as a tentacle)
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCreateOrDe]{Create or Destroy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.bwCrVfOuK0L9zAEk]{Gust of Wind}d, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.TsXoAnsMto2MIufg]{Silence}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleetStorm]{Sleet Storm}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplControlWat]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuardianFa]{Guardian of Faith} (appears as a tentacle)
